DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the clinical safety and tolerability of vabicaserin in Japanese subjects that have a sudden worsening of their symptoms of schizophrenia. The study will also assess the efficacy of vabicaserin and compare it to risperidone.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety and Tolerability of Vabicaserin in Patients With Sudden Worsening of Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects between >=20 and =<65 years of age Current diagnosis and DSMIVTR diagnosis of schizophrenia type (295.10, 295.30 and 295.90) Total PANSS score >=70 and =< 120 Subjects who are hospitalized against their will Current Axis I primary psychiatric diagnosis other than schizophrenia A score of 3 on CDSS question 8 which pertains to suicide
